titleStmt.title: Sound advice to Roman Catholics, especially the residue of poor, seduced and deluded Papists in England who obstinately shut both eyes and ears against the clearest light of the Gospel of Christ and surest evidences of Scripture and reason to which is added a Word to the people called Quakers / by T.O.
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Richard Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Titus Oates. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
